doc.previous: Media related to United States Army Air Forces 97th Bombardment Group at Wikimedia Commons
doc.after: The group was established early in 1942 and initially trained B 17 Flying Fortress crews in Florida and flew antisubmarine patrols It deployed to England as part of Operation Bolero and became the first operationally ready Eighth Air Force B 17 Flying Fortress group
